## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPAP12, PAP12</u>
- **Gene Name:** PURPLE ACID PHOSPHATASE 12, purple acid phosphatase 12
- **Description:**   purple acid phosphatase 12;(source:Araport11)
